title: Role command UX for inheritance visibility and validation
description: Update internal/cmd/role.go so role show/list/check surface inheritance information and validate full chains. role show should include inherited-from metadata and variable origin visibility; role list should indicate inheritance (e.g. inherits: parent); role check should validate inheritance graph and surface actionable errors. Add/extend command tests in internal/cmd/role_test.go to lock behavior and output expectations.
